articles.title: Last Soviet leader Mikhail Gorbachev dies at 91
articles.description: The former president opened up the USSR and saw it collapse in 1991.
articles.content: Mr Gorbachev, who took over in 1985, is best known for opening up the USSR and for his rapprochement with the West, but he was unable to prevent his country collapsing in 1991.
